sentences.en: He at first kept body and soul together by selling cartoons to the humorous papers.
sentences.cn: 他最初通过向幽默搞笑类报纸出售卡通漫画维持生计。

sentences.en: He gave a humorous account of their trip to Spain.
sentences.cn: 他饶有风趣地讲述了他们的西班牙之行。

sentences.en: He has plenty of humorous stories to tell.
sentences.cn: 他有许多幽默故事可讲.

sentences.en: He introduced his speech with a humorous anecdote.
sentences.cn: 他讲了一则幽默轶事作为讲演的引子.

sentences.en: He was quite humorous, and I liked that about him.
sentences.cn: 他很幽默，我喜欢他这一点。

sentences.en: His humorous remarks added a savor to our conversation.
sentences.cn: 他幽默的话语给谈话增添了风趣.

sentences.en: His humorous toast gingered up the party.
sentences.cn: 他幽默的祝酒辞使宴会的气氛活跃起来了.

sentences.en: His language was natural , unaffected , distinctively vivid, humorous and strongly charming.
sentences.cn: 语言既朴实无华,又鲜明生动, 幽默而富有艺术魅力.

sentences.en: Judging from the way he laughed as he told it, it was meant to be humorous.
sentences.cn: 从他讲这件事时笑的样子来看，那应该是很幽默的了。

sentences.en: Several times it became general and partially humorous , and in that manner the restaurant was reached.
sentences.cn: 有几次,大家都谈起话来,还有几分诙谐, 就这样到了饭店.

sentences.en: The book takes a humorous look at parenthood.
sentences.cn: 这本书以幽默的笔触论述了父母的身份.

sentences.en: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.cn: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

sentences.en: The play ended with a humorous epilogue.
sentences.cn: 这出戏以幽默的收场白结束。

sentences.en: The writing is brutally tough and savagely humorous.
sentences.cn: 该作品带有残酷的强悍和野性的幽默感。

sentences.en: We were all entertained by his humorous stories.
sentences.cn: 他的幽默故事使我们大家都很开心.

words.tran_cn: 非常严肃的；缺少幽默感的
缺乏幽默感的；一本正经的
缺乏幽默感地；一本正经地
幽默作家；富于幽默感的人
